directive.subject: Mandatory Attestation of Governance State Taxonomy

V1_semantic_attestation.description: Validate semantic correctness of all 12 governance_state values
V1_semantic_attestation.check: Each state has clear, non-overlapping semantics

V2_transition_rules.description: Validate transition rules against ADR-004 Change Gates
checks: G4 overwrite rule (ADR-004 Section 240) correctly stated
Tier-2 Sub-Executives cannot trigger G2 transitions
Tier-2 Sub-Executives cannot trigger G3 transitions
Tier-2 Sub-Executives cannot trigger G4 transitions
Actor constraints matrix (Section 3.2) is complete and correct

V4_legacy_state_exception.description: Audit Legacy State Exception against ADR-004 Section 348
checks: Cannot be assigned to new modules
Requires full G1-G4 re-certification to modify
All transitions have defined allowed actors
All transitions have defined forbidden actors

V6_event_type_mapping.description: Verify event type mappings in Section 6
checks: Each governance_state maps to ADR-004 event type

V7_lineage_integrity.description: Verify hash chain and lineage integrity

required_outputs.O2: Create VEGA_ATTESTATION_BUNDLE with hash_self, hash_prev, lineage_id
required_outputs.O3: Sign Appendix B v2026.PROD.2 with VEGA key (ADR-008)

enforcement.until: This attestation is 100% complete and hash-anchored

stig_attestation.statement: I, STIG (CTO), confirm that Appendix B v2026.PROD.2 is technically complete and ready for VEGA governance validation. All sections have been authored in good faith alignment with ADR-004 and ADR-014.
